properties.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Kern County Desert; Fort Tejon; Tehachapi Area
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 4 at 12:19AM PST until January 5 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sustained westerly winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts around
55 mph.

* WHERE...A portion of the Kern County mountains and desert.

* WHEN...From 2 AM PST Sunday until 10 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Strong wind gusts may blow down tree limbs. A few power outages
are possible. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high
profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not
limited to Highway 14, Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, and
Highway 178 below Walker Pass.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: A WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM PST SUNDAY UNTIL 10 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PART OF THE KERN COUNTY MOUNTAINS AND DESERT
